articles.title: Xiaomi POCO M6 Pro 4G debuts globally for budget pricing with 120 Hz AMOLED display and 64 MP triple cameras - Notebookcheck.net
articles.description: The POCO M6 Pro 4G is Xiaomi's second smartphone of the same name after August's release of the POCO M6 Pro 5G. Surprisingly, the new 4G model contains better hardware in most cases than its 5G sibling, including a 120 Hz AMOLED display, 67 W wired charging a…
articles.content: Xiaomi has announced a second POCO M6 Pro, five months after the release of a 5G variant. This time, the company has sought to offer a 4G model under the banner POCO M6 Pro 4G. Typically, Xiaomi equi… [+1229 chars]
